reviewText: Nighthawk episode: Desert storm from the cockpit of the F-117. One of my favourite documentaries ever. One of the best on the gulf war. The Vietnam episode: I bought this pack for nighthawk but this Vietnam episode was a great find.
i was under the impression it was the whole "Wings airwar over Vietnam" its not one hour documentary on Airwar in viet nam thats all.... big disapointment....

Have watched the shows on this DVD so many times and love it. Great lessons, interviews and historical details that I didn't know before but I learned watching the show. It might be a bit old cuz it was produced in early 1990s but still relevant. Highly recommended
